features.name: Damage Resistances
features.description: Damage Resistances bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapon

actions.name: Fist of Four Thunders
actions.description:
Melee Spell Attack.
Each creature other than the bender within 10 feet that can see and hear the bender must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) thunder damage.
